confirm_upload_description: A database is already loaded. Do you want to overwrite it?
drag_drop_select: Drag & drop or click to select <Badge>KoboReader.sqlite</Badge> database.
error_message_notion: An error occurred while sending annotations to Notion. Please check your Page ID and API Key.
not_uploaded_or_not_selected: You haven't uploaded the KoboReader.sqlite file or chosen a book title. Once the annotations are loaded, you can click them to see the action button.
send_to_notion_dialog_description: Please enter your Notion Page ID and API Key.
success_message_notion: Annotations have been sent to Notion successfully.
